import './PersonalInfo.scss' import { useState } from 'react'; const PersonalInfoEdit = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ first_name: '', last_name: '', father_name: '', age: '', email: '', phone: '', password: '', password2: '' }); const handleChange = event => { const { name, value, type, checked } = event.target; setFormData(prevFormData => ({ ...prevFormData, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value })); }; return (
Имя

) } export default PersonalInfoEdit
